alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 6:28PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Franklin and southwestern Lawrence Counties through 700 PM CST... At 627 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phil Campbell, or 7 miles northwest of Haleyville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phil Campbell, Spruce Pine and Bankhead National Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northwestern Alabama.
